sentences.sContent: The industry is dominated by five multinational companies.
sentences.sCn: 这个行业受五家跨国公司控制。

sentences.sContent: New Orleans dominated throughout the game.
sentences.sCn: 新奥尔良队自始至终都控制着这场比赛。

sentences.sContent: Her loud voice totally dominated the conversation.
sentences.sCn: 她的大嗓门完全主导着这场谈话。

sentences.sContent: Education issues dominated the election campaign.
sentences.sCn: 教育问题成了这次选举活动的主要辩题。

synos.tran: 控制；支配；占优势；在…中占主要地位

words.tran: 显性的；占优势的；支配的，统治的
占主导地位的；强势的；占统治地位的；[数] 受控的
控制，支配；处于支配地位（dominate的过去式）

trans.tranCn: 控制；支配；占优势；在…中占主要地位
trans.tranOther: to control someone or something or to have more importance than other people or things
